items.title: GLM API Pricing
items.description: Complete pricing table across all GLM models and capabilities.

items.a: GLM API is the official API service provided by Zhipu AI for accessing their suite of AI models including GLM-4.7 for text generation, GLM-4V for multimodal understanding, CogView for image generation, and CogVideoX for video generation. Our proxy service offers full access at 40% of the official pricing.

items.q: How much does GLM API cost?
items.a: Our GLM API pricing is 40% of the official price. For example, GLM-4-Air costs ¥0.0004/thousand tokens (official price ¥0.001), and GLM-4V-Plus costs ¥0.004/thousand tokens (official price ¥0.01). See the full pricing table for details.

items.q: How to get a GLM API key?
items.a: To get a GLM API key through our proxy service, simply submit your email address on our website. We will contact you within 72 hours to set up your API access with discounted pricing.

items.q: Is GLM API compatible with official endpoints?
items.a: Yes, our GLM API proxy is fully compatible with the official Zhipu AI API endpoints. You can use it as a drop-in replacement without modifying your code.
